about.title: We Help People In Need
about.description: NABARUN is a Non-Profit Charitable social development society founded by passionate college students in 2018. We work across various sectors of society, focusing on social upliftment to support underprivileged and marginalized communities in rural areas.

missionPoints.title: Community Care
missionPoints.description: Supporting orphans, senior citizens, and those facing medical challenges

missionPoints.title: Animal Welfare
missionPoints.description: Providing proper care and shelter for street animals in need

missionPoints.title: Education & Development
missionPoints.description: Empowering communities through education and skill development programs

founderMessage.quote: Nabarun is not just an organization; it's a beacon of hope, dedicated to making a positive impact in the world. Together, we strive to tackle pressing issues, uplift communities, and create lasting change.
founderMessage.name: Mriganka Shekhar Pal
founderMessage.title: Founder & Director

quotes.quote: Seeing the direct impact of my donation through their transparent reporting gives me confidence to contribute regularly.
quotes.author: Priya Sharma

brand.name: NABARUN
brand.description: Empowering communities through compassionate action since 2018. Together, we create lasting change and build hope for a better tomorrow.

carousel.title: Together We Can Save More Lives

services.title: Making a Difference Through Action
services.description: We focus on key areas where we can create the most meaningful impact in communities that need it most.

serviceItems.title: Child Education
serviceItems.description: Empowering young minds through quality education, school supplies, and scholarship programs to break the cycle of poverty and create brighter futures.

serviceItems.title: Medical Treatment
serviceItems.description: Providing essential healthcare services, medical camps, and treatment support for those who cannot afford proper medical care, especially in remote areas.

serviceItems.title: Clean Water Access
serviceItems.description: Ensuring access to clean, safe drinking water through well construction, water purification systems, and community education about water hygiene.

serviceItems.title: Community Development
serviceItems.description: Building stronger communities through infrastructure development, skill training programs, and sustainable livelihood initiatives for long-term growth.

serviceItems.title: Animal Welfare
serviceItems.description: Caring for street animals through rescue operations, medical treatment, vaccination drives, and finding them loving homes while promoting animal rights.

serviceItems.title: Disaster Relief
serviceItems.description: Providing immediate emergency response and long-term recovery support during natural disasters, helping communities rebuild and recover stronger.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join us in our mission to create positive change in communities around the world.

team.title: Meet Our Passionate Champions
team.description: Dedicated individuals working tirelessly to create positive change in our communities

member.bio: Passionate about creating meaningful impact in communities through dedicated service and unwavering commitment.

cta.title: Want to Join Our Mission?
cta.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals who share our vision of making a positive impact.
